children.name: Artificial Intelligence
children.details: Artificial Intelligence continues to transform various sectors with advanced machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision capabilities.

children.name: Machine Learning
children.details: ML enables systems to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

children.name: Deep Learning
children.details: Deep learning uses neural networks with many layers to model and understand complex patterns in data.

children.name: Reinforcement Learning
children.details: RL trains agents to make decisions by learning from the consequences of their actions.

children.name: Computer Vision
children.details: Computer vision enables machines to interpret and understand visual information from the world.

children.name: Natural Language Processing
children.details: NLP helps computers understand, interpret, and generate human language in a valuable way.

children.name: Large Language Models
children.details: LLMs are trained on vast amounts of text data to understand and generate human-like text.

children.name: Speech Recognition
children.details: Technology that recognizes and transcribes human speech into text format.

children.name: Sentiment Analysis
children.details: Analyzing text to determine the emotional tone and sentiment expressed.

children.name: Cloud Computing
children.description: Scalable computing resources over the internet
children.details: Cloud computing provides on-demand access to computing resources, enabling businesses to scale efficiently.

children.name: Serverless Computing
children.details: Serverless allows developers to run code without provisioning or managing servers.

children.name: AWS Lambda
children.details: AWS Lambda lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers.

children.name: Azure Functions
children.details: Event-driven serverless compute platform for Azure.

children.name: Containerization
children.details: Containers package applications with all their dependencies for consistent deployment.

children.name: Docker
children.details: Docker enables developers to package applications into containers.

children.name: Kubernetes
children.details: Kubernetes automates deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

children.name: Quantum Computing
children.details: Quantum computing leverages quantum mechanical phenomena to process information in fundamentally new ways.

children.name: Quantum Algorithms
children.details: Specialized algorithms that take advantage of quantum properties for computational speedup.

children.name: Shor's Algorithm
children.details: Quantum algorithm for efficiently factoring large integers.

children.name: Grover's Algorithm
children.details: Quantum algorithm for searching unsorted databases quadratically faster.
